content.question: (a) Describe a socialist policy used by governments to address income inequality.(b) Explain how political ideology differs from political culture.(c) Explain how socialist policies might affect economic development.(d) Explain how a government’s implementation of a socialist policy might affect its legitimacy.

frqParts.text: (a) Describe a socialist policy used by governments to address income inequality.(b) Explain how political ideology differs from political culture.(c) Explain how socialist policies might affect economic development.(d) Explain how a government’s implementation of a socialist policy might affect its legitimacy.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
